section.title: Servo
section.para: Collaboration diagram for Servo

listitem.para: struct il_servo_info_t

para.literallayout: enum il_servo_state_t { IL_SERVO_STATE_NRDY, IL_SERVO_STATE_DISABLED, IL_SERVO_STATE_RDY, IL_SERVO_STATE_ON, IL_SERVO_STATE_ENABLED, IL_SERVO_STATE_QSTOP, IL_SERVO_STATE_FAULTR, IL_SERVO_STATE_FAULT }

para.emphasis: Servo states (equivalent to CiA 402 PDS states).

para.literallayout: enum il_servo_mode_t { IL_SERVO_MODE_OLV, IL_SERVO_MODE_OLS, IL_SERVO_MODE_PP, IL_SERVO_MODE_VEL, IL_SERVO_MODE_PV, IL_SERVO_MODE_PT, IL_SERVO_MODE_HOMING, IL_SERVO_MODE_IP, IL_SERVO_MODE_CSP, IL_SERVO_MODE_CSV, IL_SERVO_MODE_CST }
enum il_units_pos_t { IL_UNITS_POS_NATIVE, IL_UNITS_POS_REV, IL_UNITS_POS_RAD, IL_UNITS_POS_DEG, IL_UNITS_POS_UM, IL_UNITS_POS_MM, IL_UNITS_POS_M }
enum il_units_vel_t { IL_UNITS_VEL_NATIVE, IL_UNITS_VEL_RPS, IL_UNITS_VEL_RPM, IL_UNITS_VEL_RAD_S, IL_UNITS_VEL_DEG_S, IL_UNITS_VEL_UM_S, IL_UNITS_VEL_MM_S, IL_UNITS_VEL_M_S }
enum il_units_acc_t { IL_UNITS_ACC_NATIVE, IL_UNITS_ACC_REV_S2, IL_UNITS_ACC_RAD_S2, IL_UNITS_ACC_DEG_S2, IL_UNITS_ACC_UM_S2, IL_UNITS_ACC_MM_S2, IL_UNITS_ACC_M_S2 }

listitem.para:
typedef struct il_servo il_servo_t
IngeniaLink servo instance.

typedef void(* il_servo_emcy_subscriber_cb_t
Emergency subscriber callback.

typedef void(* il_servo_state_subscriber_cb_t
State updates subcriber callback.

IL_EXPORT il_servo_t * il_servo_create ( il_net_t * net, uint16_t id, const char * dict)
Create IngeniaLink servo instance.

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_destroy ( il_servo_t * servo)
Destroy an IngeniaLink servo instance.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_reset ( il_servo_t * servo)
Reset servo.

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_state_get ( il_servo_t * servo, il_servo_state_t * state, int * flags)
Obtain current servo PDS state.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_state_subscribe ( il_servo_t * servo, il_servo_state_subscriber_cb_t cb, void * ctx)
Subscribe to state changes (and operation flags).

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_state_unsubscribe ( il_servo_t * servo, int slot)
Unsubscribe from state changes.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_emcy_subscribe ( il_servo_t * servo, il_servo_emcy_subscriber_cb_t cb, void * ctx)
Subscribe to emergency messages.

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_emcy_unsubscribe ( il_servo_t * servo, int slot)
Unubscribe from emergency messages.

IL_EXPORT il_dict_t * il_servo_dict_get ( il_servo_t * servo)
Obtain servo dictionary.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_dict_load ( il_servo_t * servo, const char * dict)
Load a dictionary to the servo.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_name_get ( il_servo_t * servo, char * name, size_t sz)
Obtain servo name.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_name_set ( il_servo_t * servo, const char * name)
Set servo name.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_info_get ( il_servo_t * servo, il_servo_info_t * info)
Obtain servo information.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_store_all ( il_servo_t * servo)
Store all servo current parameters to the NVM.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_store_comm ( il_servo_t * servo)
Store all servo current communications parameters to the NVM.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_store_app ( il_servo_t * servo)
Store all servo current application parameters to the NVM.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_units_update ( il_servo_t * servo)
Update units scaling factors.

IL_EXPORT double il_servo_units_factor ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg)
Obtain the units scale factor associated with the given register.

IL_EXPORT il_units_torque_t il_servo_units_torque_get ( il_servo_t * servo)
Get the torque units.

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_units_torque_set ( il_servo_t * servo, il_units_torque_t units)
Set the torque units.

IL_EXPORT il_units_pos_t il_servo_units_pos_get ( il_servo_t * servo)
Get the position units.

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_units_pos_set ( il_servo_t * servo, il_units_pos_t units)
Set the position units.

IL_EXPORT il_units_vel_t il_servo_units_vel_get ( il_servo_t * servo)
Get the velocity units.

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_units_vel_set ( il_servo_t * servo, il_units_vel_t units)
Set the velocity units.

IL_EXPORT il_units_acc_t il_servo_units_acc_get ( il_servo_t * servo)
Get the acceleration units.

IL_EXPORT void il_servo_units_acc_set ( il_servo_t * servo, il_units_acc_t units)
Set the acceleration units.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_u8 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint8_t * buf)
Read unsigned 8-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_s8 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int8_t * buf)
Read signed 8-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_u16 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint16_t * buf)
Read unsigned 16-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_s16 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int16_t * buf)
Read signed 16-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_u32 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint32_t * buf)
Read unsigned 32-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_s32 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int32_t * buf)
Read signed 32-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_u64 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint64_t * buf)
Read unsigned 64-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_s64 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int64_t * buf)
Read signed 64-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_read_float ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, float * buf)
Read signed 64-bit value from a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_read ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, double * buf)
Read a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_u8 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint8_t val, int confirm)
Write unsigned 8-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_s8 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int8_t val, int confirm)
Write signed 8-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_u16 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint16_t val, int confirm)
Write unsigned 16-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_s16 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int16_t val, int confirm)
Write signed 16-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_u32 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint32_t val, int confirm)
Write unsigned 32-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_s32 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int32_t val, int confirm)
Write signed 32-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_u64 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, uint64_t val, int confirm)
Write unsigned 64-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_s64 ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, int64_t val, int confirm)
Write signed 64-bit integer to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_raw_write_float ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, float val, int confirm)
Write float to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_write ( il_servo_t * servo, const il_reg_t * reg, const char * id, double val, int confirm)
Write to a register.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_disable ( il_servo_t * servo)
Disable servo PDS.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_switch_on ( il_servo_t * servo, int timeout)
Switch on servo PDS.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_enable ( il_servo_t * servo, int timeout)
Enable servo PDS.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_fault_reset ( il_servo_t * servo)
Reset the drive fault state.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_mode_get ( il_servo_t * servo, il_servo_mode_t * mode)
Get the servo operation mode.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_mode_set ( il_servo_t * servo, il_servo_mode_t mode)
Set the servo operation mode.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_ol_voltage_get ( il_servo_t * servo, double * voltage)
Get the open loop voltage.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_ol_voltage_set ( il_servo_t * servo, double voltage)
Set the open loop voltage.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_ol_frequency_get ( il_servo_t * servo, double * freq)
Get the open loop frequency.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_ol_frequency_set ( il_servo_t * servo, double freq)
Set the open loop frequency.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_homing_start ( il_servo_t * servo)
Start homing.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_homing_wait ( il_servo_t * servo, int timeout)
Wait until homing completes.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_torque_get ( il_servo_t * servo, double * torque)
Get the actual servo torque.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_torque_set ( il_servo_t * servo, double torque)
Set the servo target torque.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_position_get ( il_servo_t * servo, double * pos)
Get the actual servo position.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_position_set ( il_servo_t * servo, double pos, int immediate, int relative, int sp_timeout)
Set the servo target position.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_position_res_get ( il_servo_t * servo, uint32_t * res)
Obtain position resolution.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_velocity_get ( il_servo_t * servo, double * vel)
Get the actual servo velocity.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_velocity_set ( il_servo_t * servo, double vel)
Set the servo target velocity.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_velocity_res_get ( il_servo_t * servo, uint32_t * res)
Obtain velocity resolution.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_wait_reached ( il_servo_t * servo, int timeout)
Wait until the servo does a target reach.

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_lucky ( il_net_prot_t prot, il_net_t ** net, il_servo_t ** servo, const char * dict)
Utility function to connect to the first available servo drive.

#define IL_SERVO_SP_TIMEOUT_DEF 1000
Set-point acknowledge default timeout (ms).

#define IL_SERVO_NAME_SZ 9
Servo name size (includes null termination).

#define IL_SERVO_SW_VERSION_SZ 9
Servo software version size.

#define IL_SERVO_HW_VARIANT_SZ 5
Hardware variant size.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_TGT_REACHED 0x01
Flags: Target reached.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_ILIM_ACTIVE 0x02
Flags: Internal limit active.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_HOMING_ATT 0x04
Flags: (Homing): attained.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_HOMING_ERR 0x08
Flags: (Homing): error.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_PV_VZERO 0x04
Flags: (PV): Vocity speed is zero.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_PP_SPACK 0x04
Flags: (PP): SP acknowledge.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_IP_ACTIVE 0x04
Flags: (IP): active.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_CS_FOLLOWS 0x04
Flags: (CST/CSV/CSP): follow command value.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_FERR 0x08
Flags: (CST/CSV/CSP/PV): following error.

#define IL_SERVO_FLAG_IANGLE_DET 0x10
Flags: Initial angle determination finished.

section.title: enum il_servo_state_t

listitem.para: Not ready to switch on.
Switch on disabled.
Ready to be switched on.
Power switched on.
Enabled.
Quick stop.
Fault reactive.
Fault.

section.title: typedef void(* il_servo_state_subscriber_cb_t) (void *ctx, il_servo_state_t state, int flags)
IL_EXPORT il_servo_t* il_servo_create (il_net_t *net, uint16_t id, const char *dict)

formalpara.title: Returns:
formalpara.para: Servo instance (NULL if it could not be created).

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_reset (il_servo_t *servo)
section.para: You may need to reconnect the network after a reset.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_state_subscribe (il_servo_t *servo, il_servo_state_subscriber_cb_t cb, void *ctx)
section.emphasis: Subscribe to state changes (and operation flags).

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: Callbacks should be relatively fast, otherwise consecutive state changes may be lost (as there is no buffering). Note that callbacks are decoupled from the communications thread so that they do not affect other operations.

entry.para: State and operation flags change callback.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_emcy_subscribe (il_servo_t *servo, il_servo_emcy_subscriber_cb_t cb, void *ctx)

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: Callbacks should be relatively fast, otherwise some emergencies may be lost. Although an internal queue is used, it is limited. Note that callbacks are decoupled from the communications thread so that they do not affect other operations.

formalpara.title: Returns:
formalpara.para: Servo dictionary (NULL if none is loaded).

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_dict_load (il_servo_t *servo, const char *dict)
section.emphasis: Load a dictionary to the servo.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_name_get (il_servo_t *servo, char *name, size_t sz)

entry.para: Buffer where the actual name (null-terminated) will be stored.
Buffer where servo information will be stored.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_store_all (il_servo_t *servo)
section.emphasis: Store all servo current parameters to the NVM.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_store_comm (il_servo_t *servo)
section.emphasis: Store all servo current communications parameters to the NVM.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_store_app (il_servo_t *servo)
section.emphasis: Store all servo current application parameters to the NVM.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This must be called if any encoder parameter, rated torque or pole pitch are changed, otherwise, the readings conversions will not be correct.

section.title: IL_EXPORT double il_servo_units_factor (il_servo_t *servo, const il_reg_t *reg)
section.emphasis: Obtain the units scale factor associated with the given register.

formalpara.title: Returns:
formalpara.para: Torque units (IL_UNITS_TORQUE_NATIVE if servo is not valid).

formalpara.title: Returns:
formalpara.para: Position units (IL_UNITS_POS_NATIVE if servo is not valid).

formalpara.title: Returns:
formalpara.para: Velocity units (IL_UNITS_VEL_NATIVE if servo is not valid).

formalpara.title: Returns:
formalpara.para: Acceleration units (IL_UNITS_ACC_NATIVE if servo is not valid).

IL_EXPORT int il_servo_write (il_servo_t *servo, const il_reg_t *reg, const char *id, double val, int confirm)
section.para: This function will write to a register and also perform a unit conversion to match the current operating units.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: The timeout is the timeout between state changes.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: The timeout is the timeout between state changes.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This assumes that the drive is in the appropriate mote and that the PDS is enabled.

entry.para: Where the actual torque will be stored.
Where the actual position will be stored.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_position_set (il_servo_t *servo, double pos, int immediate, int relative, int sp_timeout)

entry.para: If set, the position will be set immediately, otherwise will be added to the internal servo queue.
If set, the position is taken as a relative value, otherwise it is taken as an absolute value.
Where the actual velocity will be stored.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_wait_reached (il_servo_t *servo, int timeout)
section.emphasis: Wait until the servo does a target reach.

section.title: IL_EXPORT int il_servo_lucky (il_net_prot_t prot, il_net_t **net, il_servo_t **servo, const char *dict)
section.emphasis: Utility function to connect to the first available servo drive.

entry.para: Where the servo network will be stored.
Where the first available servo will be stored.

formalpara.title: Returns:
formalpara.para: 0 if a servo is found, IL_EFAIL if none are found.
